participant_1.background:
I'm proud of my beta fish, he's very healthy and happy.
i want to move to london when i get older.
i have four siblings.
I am not close with my family and I prefer to spend time alone.
i love to do yoga.

participant_2.background:
I have started baking for my family and friends.
I do my laundry every week, except for the Renaissance Faire outfit.
My smartphone is my most valued material possession because it is an essential tool for my life
I like to listen to music as a way to relax after a day of welding and working towards my goal of skydiving.
I only dress up for special occasions because I prefer to be comfortable in my own skin.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks! How are you?
I'm doing well too! I'm excited to start yoga classes this week.
Oh cool! Yoga is great for relaxation and stress relief.
Yeah, I'm looking forward to it. I've been wanting to start for a while.
What's your favorite thing to do for fun?
I love to do yoga, read, and spend time with my beta fish.
That's cool! I like to bake, listen to music, and watch movies.
Nice! I love to bake too. What's your favorite thing to bake?
I love to bake cookies and pies. What about you?
I like to bake bread and muffins.
Oh, that sounds delicious! I've never tried baking bread before.
You should try it! It's really easy and it's so satisfying to eat fresh bread.
I might just have to try that! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about baking.
Me too! I love talking about food.
